requiredEquipmentExplanation: The metadata for this workout video, including the title "Morning Shred Routine - Burn Belly Fat," tags such as "no equipment," "bodyweight," and "home workout," and the description emphasizing "transform your physique with just your bodyweight," strongly indicates that this workout requires no equipment. The channel information further reinforces this by stating, "You don't need weights...You don't even need a gym." The top comments reflect users following bodyweight exercises, such as pushups and crunches, without mention of any equipment. Therefore, this workout appears to be bodyweight only, and no specific equipment is needed.
